name: Taco Chip Chicken Wings
author: Pam
summary: This is a very quick appetizer recipe and a good way to use up the crumbs from your tortilla chips. Flavored chips work well with this recipe. Also try using the spicier taco seasoning mix if you want a hotter chicken. Recipe can he multiplied as many times as needed. Serve with hot pepper sauce, if desired.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Rinse chicken pieces and pat dry
In a shallow dish or bowl, mix together the   mix and tortilla chip crumbs
Roll chicken pieces in chip mixture and place coated chicken in a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes
Turn chicken pieces and bake for another 15 to 20 minutes
